name.ja: レトロボウルオリジナル
name.th: ชามย้อนยุคดั้งเดิม

short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Retro Bowl Original as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.bg: Играйте Retro Bowl Original като разширение за Chrome - Можете да играете и без интернет, опитайте сега!
short.ca: Juga a Retro Bowl Original com a extensió de Chrome: també pots jugar sense Internet, prova-ho ara!
short.cs: Hrajte Retro Bowl Original jako rozšíření pro Chrome – můžete hrát i bez internetu, vyzkoušejte to hned!
short.da: Spil Retro Bowl Original som en Chrome-udvidelse - Kan også spille uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de: Spielen Sie Retro Bowl Original als Chrome-Erweiterung – auch ohne Internet möglich, probieren Sie es jetzt aus!
short.el: Παίξτε το Retro Bowl Original ως επέκταση του Chrome - Μπορείτε επίσης να παίξετε χωρίς Διαδίκτυο, δοκιμάστε το τώρα!
short.es: Juega Retro Bowl Original como una extensión de Chrome. También puedes jugar sin Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Esitage Chrome'i laiendusena Retro Bowl Original – saate mängida ka ilma Internetita, proovige seda kohe!
short.fi: Pelaa Retro Bowl Originalia Chrome-laajennuksena - Voit myös pelata ilman Internetiä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: I-play ang Retro Bowl Original bilang extension ng Chrome - Maaari ding Maglaro nang walang Internet, subukan ito ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à Retro Bowl Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Peut également jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.he: שחק Retro Bowl Original כתוסף לכרום - יכול לשחק גם ללא אינטרנט, נסה זאת עכשיו!
short.hi: क्रोम एक्सटेंशन के रूप में रेट्रो बाउल ओरिजिनल चलाएं - इंटरनेट के बिना भी खेल सकते हैं, इसे अभी आज़माएं!
short.hr: Igrajte Retro Bowl Original kao proširenje za Chrome - Možete igrati i bez interneta, isprobajte sada!
short.hu: Játssz a Retro Bowl Originalt Chrome-bővítményként – internet nélkül is játszhatsz, próbáld ki most!
short.id: Mainkan Retro Bowl Asli sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga dapat Bermain tanpa Internet, coba sekarang!
short.it: Gioca a Retro Bowl Original come estensione di Chrome: puoi giocare anche senza Internet, provalo subito!
short.ja: Retro Bowl Original を Chrome 拡張機能としてプレイ - インターネットなしでプレイすることもできます。今すぐお試しください!
short.ko: Retro Bowl Original을 Chrome 확장 프로그램으로 플레이하세요. 인터넷 없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 사용해 보세요!
short.lt: Žaiskite „Retro Bowl Original“ kaip „Chrome“ plėtinį – taip pat galite žaisti be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlējiet Retro Bowl Original kā Chrome paplašinājumu — varat spēlēt arī bez interneta, izmēģiniet to tūlīt!
short.ms: Mainkan Retro Bowl Original sebagai sambungan Chrome - Juga boleh Main tanpa Internet, cuba sekarang!
short.nl: Speel Retro Bowl Original als Chrome-extensie - Speel ook zonder internet, probeer het nu!
short.no: Spill Retro Bowl Original som en Chrome-utvidelse - Kan også spille uten Internett, prøv det nå!
short.pl: Zagraj w Retro Bowl Original jako rozszerzenie do Chrome – możesz grać także bez Internetu, wypróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Joacă Retro Bowl Original ca extensie Chrome - De asemenea, poți juca fără internet, încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Retro Bowl Original как расширение Chrome. Также можно играть без Интернета, попробуйте прямо сейчас!
short.sk: Hrajte Retro Bowl Original ako rozšírenie prehliadača Chrome – môžete hrať aj bez internetu, skúste to teraz!
short.sl: Igrajte Retro Bowl Original kot razširitev za Chrome - Igrate lahko tudi brez interneta, poskusite zdaj!
short.sr: Играјте Ретро Бовл Оригинал као додатак за Цхроме - такође можете да играте без интернета, испробајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Retro Bowl Original som en Chrome-tillägg - Kan också spela utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่น Retro Bowl Original เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเลยตอนนี้!
short.tr: Retro Bowl Original'ı Chrome uzantısı olarak oynayın - İnternet olmadan da oynayabilir, şimdi deneyin!
short.uk: Грайте в Retro Bowl Original як розширення Chrome – також можна грати без Інтернету, спробуйте зараз!
short.vi: Chơi Retro Bowl Original dưới dạng tiện ích mở rộng của Chrome - Cũng có thể Chơi mà không cần Internet, hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 作为 Chrome 扩展程序玩 Retro Bowl Original - 也可以在没有互联网的情况下玩，立即尝试！
short.zh_TW: 作為 Chrome 擴充功能玩 Retro Bowl Original - 也可以在沒有網路的情況下玩，立即嘗試！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Play more games on the top-left menu.


"Retro Bowl Official is the ultimate Chrome extension for football enthusiasts who crave the nostalgic thrill of classic sports gaming. Immerse yourself in a pixelated world reminiscent of the golden era of video games, as this extension transforms your browsing experience into a virtual football stadium.

With Retro Bowl Official, relive the excitement of 8-bit graphics and straightforward gameplay, reminiscent of beloved sports titles from the past. This extension brings a touch of retro charm to your Chrome browser, allowing you to seamlessly access your favorite football content while enjoying a visually engaging throwback to simpler gaming times.

Key Features:

Pixelated Glory: Witness the revival of pixel art with Retro Bowl Official, offering a visually pleasing homage to the iconic graphics of classic sports games.

Seamless Integration: Enjoy the convenience of browsing the web while staying connected to your love for football. Retro Bowl Official seamlessly integrates with your Chrome browser, making it an effortless addition to your daily online activities.

Customization Options: Tailor your experience with customizable settings, allowing you to adjust the extension to suit your preferences. Whether it's team colors, background themes, or other personalization options, Retro Bowl Official puts you in control.

Quick Access: Stay updated with real-time football scores, news, and highlights directly from your Chrome browser. Retro Bowl Official provides quick access to the latest updates without disrupting your browsing flow.

Lightweight and Fast: Designed to be lightweight and fast, Retro Bowl Official won't slow down your browser. Enjoy a smooth browsing experience while indulging in the retro gaming aesthetics.

Reignite your passion for football and gaming with Retro Bowl Official, the Chrome extension that combines the best of both worlds. Dive into a world where simplicity meets excitement, and every click brings you closer to the thrill of classic football gaming. Install Retro Bowl Official now and let the games begin!"
